body.name: Digital Camera, 1080P Point and Shoot Digital Cameras 48MP Digital Camera for Teans Vlogging Camera for Boys Girls Anti Shake 18x Zoom with 32G TF Card Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 33 mins
features: [1080P Video and Spectacular 48-Megapixel Photos]: Unleash the power of photography and videography with this digital camera. It captures immersive 1080P video and produces breathtaking 48-megapixel photos, ensuring your memories are permanently preserved in extraordinary clarity and detail. This rechargeable high-definition camcorder allows you and your friends to capture life's most beautiful moments and savor the beauty of life.

[18x Digital Zoom for Precision Shooting]: Explore the world's every nook and cranny without sacrificing detail. The 18x digital zoom feature lets you magnify and capture even the subtlest nuances with unmatched precision. It also supports various shooting modes like timed shots, and smile detection, making it suitable for a variety of scenarios.

[Autofocus and High-Speed Continuous Shooting]: Bid farewell to blurry photos. This digital camera for teen offers lightning-fast autofocus, ensuring your subjects remain consistently sharp and focused. The high-speed continuous shooting mode effortlessly captures fast-paced action, making toddler camera perfect for outdoor sports photography and recording your every thrilling moment.

[Vlogging & Webcam]: This high-definition point and shot digital cameras not only allows you to capture high-quality videos and photos but also effortlessly enhances your online presence. When connected to a computer, this kids camera can seamlessly transform into a high-quality webcam, ideal for online streaming, virtual meetings, and video conferences. Your virtual interactions will exude professionalism and clarity, requiring only a simple USB connection to your laptop.

[Accessory Package and Warranty]: Enhance your photography experience with a comprehensive accessory bundle, including 4K Digital Camera x1, USB Cablex1,User Manual x 1. We offer a robust warranty to ensure the safety of your investment, providing you with peace of mind. We provide a three-month money-back guarantee and a two-year warranty to ensure you can enjoy our high-quality after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This 4K digital camera is designed specifically for children aged 7-12. It has a unique appearance, automatic focus, high-definition video recording, 18x digital zoom, and other powerful features, making it a beautiful gift for kids

Smiling Face Capture This HD camera supports the smile capture feature. Enable this function, and the camera will automatically take a photo when it detects smiling Camera Timer This camera also supports timer, allowing you to capture perfect selfies even when you're alone Play Back This camera is equipped with a play back function, allowing you to easily check back the pictures anytime Various Filters Additionally, our camera is equipped with various filters, allowing you to enjoy the fun of photography with different colors
Perfect Gift for Boys and Girls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought this for my 8yr old
reviews.reviewText: This turned out to be a great camera for my son as a first time camera. Especially for that age and to get started. The only thing I didn’t see or read was about the memory. If you plan on buying an extra memory card like I did it only takes a micro SD not a regular SD :).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There is a bad..
reviews.reviewText: This is a great camera with good quality pictures. The only bad thing is the audio is very bad. It sounds like you have it in your pocket in the pool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for kids
reviews.reviewText: I got two of these for my sons who love taking pictures. The included memory card with the right settings allows them to take 48,000+ pictures. No these are not amazing pictures but look great on the back of the screen. I see these as cameras they can learn with and get used to having a camera. More importantly, if it breaks or gets lost no one cries and we buy another.I am a professional photographer and image quality wise you are looking at a low tier cell phone grade camera with a lot of resolution. So I wouldn't get this to take pictures that you care about but my kids love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for my use....
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera to keep handy for taking accident pics at the scene if I am, heaven forbid, ever in a car accident. During my truck driving career it was general practice to keep one of those little disposable cameras you send in to get developed in the truck just for that purpose. Guess you could call it habit by now, 15 years and several trucks later. Thankfully, I've never had the occasion to have to use one. I hope it remains that way, but these days people are driving so much crazier that I now have two dashcams, front and back, and now this camera kept charged and ready to use in the glove box of my car. Video and pics, or "It didn't happen that way".....am I right, lol? This camera works great for my use, pics are clear and crisp enough and video looks pretty darn good, better than I expected for a "kids' camera". I'm glad to have it on board, let's just hope I don't have to pull it out of the glove box and use it 🤞.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Reasonably Priced Camera For a Beginner
reviews.reviewText: If you want a very reasonably priced camera to take pictures and have a little creative fun, this camera is perfect. It is self contained and easy to use. The camera came with a wrist strap, a micro SD card, a carry bag, a cord for recharging, and instructionsThis is an amazing little camera for a beginner or young child. It has a built in flash; it can zoom; and the base has ¼” threaded receiver for tripod shooting. The instruction manual is helpful, but not everything is listed in it. I’ll try to highlight some of the features and menu items I found:* ISO: 100 to 400 plus Auto* Anti shake option* Timer capture: 2, 5, 10 seconds* Face detection* Smile capture* Multi snapshot: 1, 3, 5 shots* Mode Settings: Auto, Night, Portrait, Landscape, Badlight, Sport, Party, Beach, High Sensitivity* Flash on/off, auto* Focus: Full or semi-auto* Movie Size: 3840x2160, 2688x1520, 1920x1080HD, 1280x720HD, 640x480* Exposure: 3 stops up and down* White balance: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Fluorescent, and Tungsten* Quality: Super fine, Fine, and Normal* Sharpness: Sharp, Normal, or Soft* Effects: Blue, Sunset, Warm, Cool, Over exposure, IR, Binary, Vivid, Undertone, Dog Eyes, Aibao, Gothic, Japan Style, LOMO, Negative, Normal, B&W, Sepia, Red, and Green* Saturation: High, Normal, and Low* Date Stamp: Off, Date, Date and Time* Multiple Languages available.* Date/Time Set* Resolution: 48M, 36M, 30M, 24M, 20M, 16M, 13M, 12M, 10M, 8M, 6M, 4M, and 2M* Power Save: Off, 1, 3, or 5 minutes* Screen Save: Off, 60, 90, or 120 seconds* Beep: On/Off* LCD Brightness: Levels 1-7* Frequency: 60Hz, 50Hz* Card Formatting* Reset to default settingsPros:* Comes with Micro SD Card* Lots of Effects and Features* Compact size* Has zoom and flash* Can be mounted to a tripod* Takes pictures and records videoCons:* Instruction manual is limited in what the camera can do.* Carrying bag is not going to protect the camera. It is thin fabric with drawstring.* The lens cover appears to be clear plastic and could easily scratch.I played around with this camera and even took some video. However, because the video included family members, I cannot share it here. I will say I was impressed that the camera did such a great job with the video considering that it is a point and shoot camera. Placed on a tripod it recorded movement evenly and I did not notice any “choppy” points in the video (I shot at 1920x1080HD).I did include pictures I took of the instruction manual. I tried to do as many changes as I could think of and I assembled a couple collages of the pictures for you to see. This was only a fraction of the changes you could do. That said, the camera can give you a lot of creative freedom.Overall, I found the camera to be a lot of fun and I would rate it at 5 stars. It is best for a beginner, a young child, or someone on a fixed budget that wants to have a point and shoot camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Sure I would Use this as Kid's Camera
reviews.reviewText: I will do a video later where I will compare it with various other cameras I have, including a professional HD Camera.So far, the image on this camera is very grainy and low grade. They advertise it as a kid's camera, but I think I would spend a little more to get a better image. Sometimes kids luck out and capture a great picture. How sad would everyone be when they can't make a print because the image quality is so low?I would extend this to Video Blogging. Get a better camera, people will notice when it comes to this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice beginner camera for kids
reviews.reviewText: This was described as a 1080P 48MP camera for kids, but this camera has a lot of features that would make it good for any beginner. It would also work well for a backup camera. It’s pretty compact plus it's very lightweight. It works best in well lit conditions, but I also took pictures of a Christmas lighting display and those came out well. My grand kids, three and seven, have also used the camera and have taken some fun pictures. I think it’s a good value and recommend this item.
